name: Hot Spot (taroble, Daniel Domingo, Plisma45, Star Games, bravestcolour)
name_original: Hot Spot (taroble, Daniel Domingo, Plisma45, Star Games, bravestcolour)
description:
Submitted for the SGDA Game Jam 2020, where the theme was "Internet Friends"!

You play as a little blob, who wants to have a phone conversation with their internet friend! Cellular reception is awful in this hectic town, so you will have to avoid obstacles like cars and angry pedestrians while keeping your reception high enough to talk to your friend.

Credits:
Alex Young - Music Composer
Bou Minchin - Designer
Daniel Domingo - Programmer
Michael Perez - Programmer
Nick Rogers - Sound Designer
Stephanie Pocci - Designer & 2D Artist
Tara Nguyen - Producer & 3D Artist
